,"schApplication"."agarulyearmax" "agarulyearmax" ,"schApplication"."agarulmonthmax" "agarulmonthmax" ,"schApplication"."studentBalance1" "studentBalance1" ,"schApplication"."studentnotes" "studentnotes" ,"schApplication"."paidrosom" "paidrosom" ,"schApplication"."fatherrecord" "fatherrecord" from "dbo"."schApplication" "schApplication" left join "dbo"."schtrnstype" "schtrns" on "schApplication"."schtrnsid" = "schtrns"."schtrnsid" left join "dbo"."schBranch" "Thebranch" on "schApplication"."branch" = "Thebranch"."branch" left join "dbo"."glmulcmp" "Thebranchsgm" on "Thebranch"."sgm" = "Thebranchsgm"."sgmid" left join "dbo"."OpCo" "ThebranchsgmOpco" on "Thebranchsgm"."OpcoID" = "ThebranchsgmOpco"."OpcoIDidentity" left join "dbo"."PyGender" "ThebranchGender" on "Thebranch"."Genderid" = "ThebranchGender"."Genderid" left join "dbo"."schStage" "Thebranchstage" on "Thebranch"."stagecode" = "Thebranchstage"."Code" left join "dbo"."schtyp" "Thebranchschtyp" on "Thebranch"."schtypid" = "Thebranchschtyp"."schtypid" left join "dbo"."SchStudent" "Student" on "schApplication"."StudentCode" = "Student"."StudentCode" left join "dbo"."schArea" "Studentarea" on "Student"."area" = "Studentarea"."Code" left join "dbo"."schBranch" "Studentbranch" on "Student"."branch" = "Studentbranch"."branch" left join "dbo"."glmulcmp" "Studentbranchsgm" on "Studentbranch"."sgm" = "Studentbranchsgm"."sgmid" left join "dbo"."PyGender" "StudentbranchGender" on "Studentbranch"."Genderid" = "StudentbranchGender"."Genderid" left join "dbo"."schStage" "Studentbranchstage" on "Studentbranch"."stagecode" = "Studentbranchstage"."Code" left join "dbo"."schtyp" "Studentbranchschtyp" on "Studentbranch"."schtypid" = "Studentbranchschtyp"."schtypid" left join "dbo"."PYCntry" "StudentCntry_" on "Student"."Cntry_No" = "StudentCntry_"."Cntry_No" left join "dbo"."PyGender" "StudentGender" on "Student"."Genderid" = "StudentGender"."Genderid" left join "dbo"."PyReljan" "StudentReligion" on "Student"."Religion" = "StudentReligion"."reljan" left join "dbo"."PyState" "Studentstate" on "Student"."state" = "Studentstate"."State" left join "dbo"."reg_other_schools" "Studentid" on "Student"."id" = "Studentid"."id" left join "dbo"."schAcademicyear" "Studentacd" on "Student"."acdcode" = "Studentacd"."Code" left join "dbo"."GlFinanceperiod" "StudentacdGlFinperiod" on "Studentacd"."GlFinperiodID" = "StudentacdGlFinperiod"."GlFinperiodID" left join "dbo"."schClassConfig" "StudentClass" on "Student"."Class" = "StudentClass"."classcode" left join "dbo"."Schclasskindlist" "StudentSchclasskind" on "Student"."Schclasskindid" = "StudentSchclasskind"."Schclasskindid" left join "dbo"."schFather" "StudentFather" on "Student"."FatherCode" = "StudentFather"."FatherCode" left join "dbo"."PyStatus" "StudentFatherMaritalStatus" on "StudentFather"."MaritalStatus" = "StudentFatherMaritalStatus"."Status_Type" left join "dbo"."schArea" "StudentFatherState"."State" left join "dbo"."SchFatherjob" "StudentFatherjob_" on "StudentFather"."job_no" = "StudentFatherjob_"."job_no" left join "dbo"."schGrade" "StudentGrade" on "Student"."GradeCode" = "StudentGrade"."GradeCode" left join "dbo"."schAcademicyear" "StudentGradeacd" on "StudentGrade"."acdcode" = "StudentGradeacd"."Code" left join "dbo"."schStage" "StudentMotherCntry_"."Cntry_No" left join "dbo"."PyReljan" "StudentMotherreligion" on "StudentMother"."religion" = "StudentMotherreligion"."reljan" left join "dbo"."PyState" "StudentMotherState" on "dbo"."schstclasskinddmg" "Studentschstclasskinddmg" on "Student"."schstclasskinddmgid" = "Studentschstclasskinddmg"."schstclasskinddmgid" left join "dbo"."schstespetialest" "Studentschstspl" on "dbo"."Schstudentsefa" "Studentstudentsefa" on "Student"."studentsefa" = "Studentstudentsefa"."studentsefaid" left join "dbo"."GLmstrfl" "Studentstudentsefadebitaccount" on "Studentstudentsefa"."debitaccount" = "Studentstudentsefadebitaccount"."Acc_No" left join "dbo"."schstudenttyp" "Studentschstudenttyp" on "Student"."schstudenttypid" = "Studentschstudenttyp"."schstudenttypid" left join "dbo"."Schtransferlist" "StudentSchtransfer" on "Student"."Schtransferid" = "StudentSchtransfer"."Schtransferid" left join "dbo"."PYCntry" "Cntry_" on "schApplication"."Cntry_No" = "Cntry_"."Cntry_No" left join "dbo"."PyGender" "Gender" on "schApplication"."Genderid" = "Gender"."Genderid" left join "dbo"."schStage" "StageAppliedto" on "schApplication"."StageAppliedto" = "StageAppliedto"."Code" left join "dbo"."schGrade" "GradeApplied" on "schApplication"."GradeApplied" = "GradeApplied"."GradeCode" left join "dbo"."schAcademicyear" "GradeAppliedacd" on "GradeApplied"."acdcode" = "GradeAppliedacd"."Code" left join "dbo"."GlFinanceperiod" "GradeAppliedacdGlFinperiod" on "GradeAppliedacd"."GlFinperiodID" = "GradeAppliedacdGlFinperiod"."GlFinperiodID" left join "dbo"."schStage" "GradeAppliedStage" on "GradeApplied"."StageCode" = "GradeAppliedStage"."Code" left join "dbo"."schAcademicyear" "AcademicYearto" on "schApplication"."AcademicYearto" = "AcademicYearto"."Code" left join "dbo"."GlFinanceperiod" "AcademicYeartoGlFinperiod" on "AcademicYearto"."GlFinperiodID" = "AcademicYeartoGlFinperiod"."GlFinperiodID" left join "dbo"."GLmstrfl" "AcademicYeartoGlFinperiodaccountnumber" on "AcademicYeartoGlFinperiod"."accountnumber" = "AcademicYeartoGlFinperiodaccountnumber"."Acc_No" left join "dbo"."schClassConfig" "Class" on "schApplication"."Class" = "Class"."classcode" left join "dbo"."schstatus" "schstatus_" on "schApplication"."schstatus_code" = "schstatus_"."schstatus_code" left join "dbo"."schstudenttyp" "schstudenttyp" on "schApplication"."schstudenttypid" = "schstudenttyp"."schstudenttypid" left join "dbo"."reg_other_schools" "Theid" on "schApplication"."id" = "Theid"."id" left join "dbo"."schsthealthcase" "schsthlthcase" on "schApplication"."schsthlthcaseid" = "schsthlthcase"."schsthlthcaseid" left join "dbo"."PYCntry" "Cntry_No1" on "schApplication"."Cntry_No1" = "Cntry_No1"."Cntry_No" left join "dbo"."PYCntry" "Cntry_No2" on "schApplication"."Cntry_No2" = "Cntry_No2"."Cntry_No" left join "dbo"."PyState" "state" on "schApplication"."state" = "state"."State" left join "dbo"."schArea" "area" on "schApplication"."area" = "area"."Code" left join "dbo"."SchMotherjob" "mothercase" on "schApplication"."mothercase" = "mothercase"."job_no" left join "dbo"."SchFatherjob" "fathercase" on "schApplication"."fathercase" = "fathercase"."job_no" left join "dbo"."schsocialstatuscase" "socialstatus" on "schApplication"."socialstatus" = "socialstatus"."schsocialstatuscaseid" left join "dbo"."Schstudentsefa" "studentsefa" on "schApplication"."studentsefa" = "studentsefa"."studentsefaid" left join "dbo"."GLmstrfl" "studentsefadebitaccount" on "studentsefa"."debitaccount" = "studentsefadebitaccount"."Acc_No" left join "dbo"."GLmfbab" "studentsefadebitaccountClsacc_" on "studentsefadebitaccount"."Clsacc_No" = "studentsefadebitaccountClsacc_"."Acc_Bab" left join "dbo"."GLmfband" "studentsefadebitaccountAcc_Bnd" on "studentsefadebitaccount"."Acc_Bnd" = "studentsefadebitaccountAcc_Bnd"."Acc_Bnd" left join "dbo"."Schclasskindlist" "Schclasskind" on "schApplication"."Schclasskindid" = "Schclasskind"."Schclasskindid" left join "dbo"."schstclasskinddmg" "schstclasskinddmg" on "schApplication"."schstclasskinddmgid" = "schstclasskinddmg"."schstclasskinddmgid" left join "dbo"."Schtransferlist" "Schtransfer" on "schApplication"."Schtransferid" = "Schtransfer"."Schtransferid"

field.name: StudentacdGlFinperiodFin_period_info
field.label: Studentacd Gl Finperiod Fin period info

field.name: GradeAppliedacdGlFinperiodFin_period_info
field.label: Grade Appliedacd Gl Finperiod Fin period info

field.name: AcademicYeartoGlFinperiodFin_period_info
field.label: Academic Yearto Gl Finperiod Fin period info

field.name: AcademicYeartoGlFinperiodaccountnumberAcc_Nm
field.label: Academic Yearto Gl Finperiodaccountnumber Acc Nm

action.data:
declare @studentBalance1x real set @studentBalance1x=(select sum(isnull(tr_db,0))-sum(isnull(tr_cr,0)) from GLschstatment where branch=@branch and foryearcode=@AcademicYearto and GLschstatment.CSMSUP_NO=@StudentCode and GLschstatment.cstyp_NO=3 and jr_ty<>15)
update schApplication set studentBalance1=@studentBalance1x where AcademicYearto=@AcademicYearto and studentcode=@StudentCode and branch=@branch
declare @paidrosom1 real set @paidrosom1=(select sum(isnull(tr_cr,0)) from GLschstatment where branch=@branch and foryearcode=@AcademicYearto and GLschstatment.CSMSUP_NO=@StudentCode and GLschstatment.cstyp_NO=3 and jr_ty<>15)
update schApplication set paidrosom=@paidrosom1 where AcademicYearto=@AcademicYearto and studentcode=@StudentCode and branch=@branch
update SchStudent set SchStudent.Rerecord=@paidrosom1 where acdcode=@AcademicYearto and studentcode=@StudentCode and branch=@branch

update [schApplication] Set Class= @Parameters_damincode where ApplicationCodeauto = @ApplicationCodeauto
update [SchStudent] Set Class= @Parameters_damincode ,Classto= @Parameters_damincode where StudentCode= @StudentCode

update [schApplication] Set GradeApplied= @Parameters_damincode where ApplicationCodeauto = @ApplicationCodeauto
update [SchStudent] Set GradeCode= @Parameters_damincode ,GradeApplied= @Parameters_damincode where StudentCode= @StudentCode

update [schApplication] Set civilidst= @Parameters_damincode where StudentCode= @StudentCode
update [SchStudent] Set SchstCivilidnumber= @Parameters_damincode where StudentCode= @StudentCode

businessRules.rule: if @studentBalance1>0 begin /* prevent the default action processing */ set @BusinessRules_PreventDefault = 1 /* set the focus on the field and display an error */ set @Result_Focus = 'studentBalance1, More than zero .' end

set @studentnotes=(select schComment from schComments where studentcode=@studentcode and acdcode1=@AcademicYearto) if @studentnotes is not null begin /* prevent the default action processing */ set @BusinessRules_PreventDefault = 1 /* set the focus on the field and display an error */ set @Result_Focus = 'studentnotes,ther are.' end

set @Result_Focus = 'studentnotes,ther are.' if @fathertel3 is not null begin set @fatheraddress=(select residenceaddress1 from schFather where fathCivilidNumber=@fathertel3) set @Fathertel=(select ResidenceTel1 from schFather where fathCivilidNumber=@fathertel3)
end set @studentnotes=(select schComment from schComments where studentcode=@studentcode and acdcode1=@AcademicYearto) if @studentnotes is not null begin /* prevent the default action processing */ set @BusinessRules_PreventDefault = 1 /* set the focus on the field and display an error */ set @Result_Focus = 'studentnotes,ther are.' end
